title: Bill Data Schema
description: Schema for defining bills in bills.json, based on the Bill interface in bill.ts.

date.description: The date of the transaction in YYYY-MM-DD format.

original-amount.description: Optional. The original amount of the transaction in a foreign currency.

original-unit.description: Optional. The original currency unit (e.g., '$', 'â‚¬'). Should be used with 'original-amount'.

exchanged-amount.description: The final amount of the transaction after currency exchange, in the default currency.

target.description: The target of the transaction. For income, this is the source; for outlay, this is the recipient.

operator.description: The person or system that performed the transaction.

description.description: A detailed description of the transaction content.

type.description: The type of the bill, either an income or an outlay.
